S02vadhdhdu:4: evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān kośāmbyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ viharati sma /
S02vadhdhdu:5_0: kaṇṭakasaṃjñake mahāvanavare ghoṣitārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ pañcamātrair
S02vadhdhdu:5_1: bhikṣuśataiḥ saṃbahulaiś ca śrāvakair asaṃkhyayaiś ca bodhisattvaiḥ sarvabuddhaguṇasamanvāgataiḥ /
S02vadhdhdu:6: tatra khalu bhagavāṃs tasyām eva parṣadi tair eva parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ sarvadāridryavyādhiduḥkhārṇavapariśoṣaṇaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ deśayati sma /
S02vadhdhdu:7: ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇaṃ paryavasāne kalyāṇaṃ svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ saṃprakāśayati sma /
S02vadhdhdu:8: tena khalu punaḥ samayena kauśāmbyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ sucandro nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasati sma /
S02vadhdhdu:9: upaśāntendriyopaśāntamānaso bahuputro bahuduhitaro bahubhṛtyajanasaṃpannaḥ śrāddho mahāśrāddhaḥ /
S02vadhdhdu:10: tena khalu punaḥ samayena yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrānta upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantam anekaśatasahasraṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte nyaṣīdat /
S02vadhdhdu:11: ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ sucandro nāma gṛhapatir bhagavantam etad avocat /
S02vadhdhdu:12: pṛccheyam ahaṃ bhagavantaṃ tathāgataṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ kiñcid eva pradeśaṃ sacen me bhagavān avakāśaṃ kuryāt pṛṣṭapraśnavyākaraṇāya /
S02vadhdhdu:13: evam ukte bhagavān sucandragṛhapatim etad avocat /
S02vadhdhdu:14: pṛccha tvaṃ gṛhapate yad yad evākāṃkṣasyan te tatra praśnavyākaraṇena cittam ārādhayiṣye /
S02vadhdhdu:15: evam ukte sucandro gṛhapatiḥ sādhu bhagavann iti bhagavato vacanaṃ pratiśrutya bhagavantam etad avocat /
S02vadhdhdu:16: kathaṃ bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā daridro bhūtvā adaridro bhavati /
S02vadhdhdu:18: atha khalu bhagavān jānann eva sucandraṃ gṛhapatim etad avocat /
S02vadhdhdu:19: kim iti tvaṃ gṛhapate daridratāyāḥ paripraśnaṃ pṛcchasi?
S02vadhdhdu:20: evam ukte sucandro gṛhapatir bhagavantam etad avocat /
S02vadhdhdu:21: daridro 'haṃ bhagavan daridro 'haṃ sugata bahupoṣo bahuputro bahuduhitṛko bahubhṛtyaparijanasaṃpannaḥ tad deśayatu bhagavān dharmaparyāyaṃ yena daridrasattvā adaridrā bhaveyuḥ /
S02vadhdhdu:24: priyā manāpāḥ paramamanojñāḥ darśanīyāś ca bhaveyuḥ /
S02vadhdhdu:29: evam ukte bhagavān sarvāśāparipūrakena brahmasvareṇa sucandraṃ gṛhapatim etad avocat /
S02vadhdhdu:30_0: asti gṛhapate bhūtapūrvam atīte 'dhvany asaṃkhyeyeṣu kalpeṣu yadāsīt tena kālena
S02vadhdhdu:30_1: tena samayena bhagavān śrīvajradharasāgaranirghoṣo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho
S02vadhdhdu:30_2: loka utpādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā
S02vadhdhdu:30_3: devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān,
S02vadhdhdu:31: tasya tathāgatasyāntike mayā gṛhapate vasudhārā nāma dhāraṇī śrutā /
S02vadhdhdu:32: śrutvā ca udgṛhītā dhāritā vācitā deśitā paryavāptā /
S02vadhdhdu:34: aham apy etarhi te kulaputra tān dhāraṇīṃ tathā bhāṣiṣye /
S02vadhdhdu:35: yathā asyā dhāraṇyāḥ prabhāvena kulaputra mānuṣā na viheṭhayanti /
S02vadhdhdu:57: evaṃ yāvat puṣpāhārāḥ phalāhārāḥ patrāhārāḥ tvacāhārāḥ skandhāhārāḥ mūlāhārāḥ gandhāhārāḥ dhūpāhārāḥ dīpāhārāḥ mālāhārāḥ āhutyāhārāḥ na viheṭhayanti /
S02vadhdhdu:58: ojohārāḥ svedāhārāḥ rasāhārāḥ raktāhārāḥ māṃsāhārāḥ medāhārāḥ asthyāhārāḥ majjāhārāḥ rudhirāhārāḥ śukrāhārāḥ jīvitāhārāḥ sarve na viheṭhayanti /
S02vadhdhdu:59: evaṃ yāvad viṣṭhāhārāḥ mutrāhārāḥ kheṭāhārāḥ siṃghāṇakāhārāḥ kledāhārā śleṣmāhārāḥ ucchviṣṭāhārāḥ anucchiṣṭāhārāḥ ucchiṣṭāhārā na viheṭhayanti /
S02vadhdhdu:65_0: rūpāhārāḥ śabdāhārāḥ gandhāhārāḥ rasāhārāḥ sparśāhārāḥ āhutyāhārāḥ nānārūpāhārāḥ
S02vadhdhdu:65_2: balyāhārāḥ aśucyāhārāḥ vicitrāhārāḥ yāvad ucchiṣṭāhārāḥ na viheṭhayanti /
S02vadhdhdu:66: yāvat khecarāḥ bhūcarāḥ antarīkṣacarāḥ jalacarāḥ sthalacarāḥ sarve na viheṭhayanti /
S02vadhdhdu:67_0: eteṣāṃ mama sarvasattvānāṃ mahāvajreṇa mūrdhnisphālanāya sphoṭanāya praharaṇāya hūṃ
S02vadhdhdu:67_1: 2 phaṭ vajreṇa sarvaduṣṭān sarvaśatrūn māraya 2 śoṣaya 2 stambhaya 2 bandhaya 2 hana
S02vadhdhdu:67_2: 2 daha 2 paca 2 mara 2 māraya 2 sarvaśatrūn nāśaya 2 hūṃ phaṭ svāhā /
S02vadhdhdu:68_0: yasya ca kulaputra iyaṃ sā gṛhapate vasudhārā nāma dhāraṇī śrāddhasya kulaputrasya
S02vadhdhdu:68_1: vā kuladuhitur vā hṛdayagatā gṛhagatā hastagatā pustakagatā śrutimātragatā paryavāptā
S02vadhdhdu:68_2: manasā suparicintitā dhāritā vācitā likhitā anumoditā parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśitā ca tad bhaviṣyati /
S02vadhdhdu:69: tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā dīrgharātram arthāya hitāya sukhāya kṣemāya subhikṣāya yogasaṃbhārāya bhaviṣyati /
S02vadhdhdu:70: yaś cemāṃ vasudhārā nāma dhāraṇīṃ tathāgatebhyo 'rhadbhyaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhya udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā namaskṛtvā āvartayet /
S02vadhdhdu:72: ardharātre tricaturvārāṇi tasya devatā āttamanasthā pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto vācayet /
S02vadhdhdu:73: tadā bhagavatyā vasudhārayā svayam evāgatya dhanadhānyahiraṇyavṛṣṭiṃ pātayiṣyanti /
S02vadhdhdu:74_0: prītyā tathāgataśāsane prītyā buddhaprajñaptyā prītyā dharmaprajñaptyā prītyā saṃghaprajñaptyā
S02vadhdhdu:81: namaḥ kṣemaṅkarasya tathāgatasya namo vajradharasāgaragambhīrasya tathāgatasya /
S02vadhdhdu:82: [Vdh-DH_134] agrayugaprāptebhyo bhadrayugaprāptebhyo vipaśyādibhyaḥ śākyamunibhyo dānapāramitāparipūrṇebhyo bhagavadbhyaḥ vipaśyinas tejasā /
S02vadhdhdu:83: ṛddhyā ca śikhinas tathā viśvabhukprajñayā caiva /
S02vadhdhdu:86: maitreyasya pratijñayā samṛddhyantu me tathāgatasya ime mantrapadāḥ /
S02vadhdhdu:90: tadyathā ḥ oṃ hūṃ hūṃ oṃ śrīdhane 2 dhanaiśvarye śukramāṇe(?)
S02vadhdhdu:94: koṭe 2 koṭāvare koṭīśvarye anantāparyantasarvaratnavastrālaṅkārābharaṇāni dhanadhānyavṛddhiṃkari cintitotpatti samohani /
S02vadhdhdu:97_0: buddhe 2 buddhasatye dharmasatye saṃghasatye sarvabuddhabodhisattvasatye bodhiprāgbhārasatye
S02vadhdhdu:97_1: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhasatye brahmasatye viṣṇusatye rudrasatye lokapālasatye dhanadājñākari
S02vadhdhdu:100: oṃ cara 2 ciri 2 curu 2 hulu 2 mulu 2 /
S02vadhdhdu:103: iṭi 2 miṭi 2 sara 2 saṃsara 2 vigata sa ihāgacchāgaccha bhagavati vasudhāre mama sarvasattvānāṃ ca gṛhe sādhakānāṃ mano icchāgamaṃ paripūraya /
S02vadhdhdu:104: bhagavati uttiṣṭha vidyāsarvabuddhā bhagavantaḥ samājñāpayanti svāhā /
S02vadhdhdu:113: oṃ amṛtakuṇḍali kha kha khāhi 2 tiṣṭha 2 bandha 2 hana 2 daha 2 paca 2 mara 2 garjja 2 visphoṭaya 2 sarvavighnavināyakānāṃ mahāgaṇapatijīvitāntakarāya hūṃ 2 phaṭ svāhā /
S02vadhdhdu:114: oṃ sumbhani sumbhani hūṃ gṛhṇa 2 gṛhṇāpaya 2 hūṃ ānaya ho bhagavan vidyārāja hūṃ 2 phaṭ svāhā /
S02vadhdhdu:115: oṃ vajrayakṣa hana hūṃ phaṭ svāhā /
S02vadhdhdu:203: oṃ śrīamoghāṅkuśe jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ svāhā /
S02vadhdhdu:216: oṃ śrī tare taratare tāra tame merura virura tāraya 2 svāhā /
S02vadhdhdu:217: oṃ śrī tārayantu māṃ bhagavati vasudhārānāma dhāraṇī mama sarvasattvānāṃ ca icchāgamane oṃ śrī bhagavati oṃ tāre tuttāre ture svāhā /
S02vadhdhdu:218: oṃ śrī bhagavati vasudhārānāma dhāraṇī mama mahārakṣāvaraṇaguptiṅkari svāhā /
S02vadhdhdu:226: oṃ śrīvasuṃ dade vasudhe kuru 2 svāhā /
S02vadhdhdu:239: oṃ śrīvajradharasāgaranirghoṣo nāma tathāgatasatyam anusmara 3 svāhā /
S02vadhdhdu:244_0: oṃ śrītaṭa mama saparivārasya sarvasattvānāṃ ca sarvāśāparipūraya 2 mama sarvasattvānāṃ
S02vadhdhdu:244_1: ca gṛhe ākāśagataṃ vā pṛthivīgataṃ vā jalagataṃ vā sthalagataṃ vā antarīkṣagataṃ
S02vadhdhdu:244_2: vā bhūmigataṃ vā svargagataṃ vā martyagataṃ vā pātālagataṃ vā samudragataṃ vā saptadvīpāntagataṃ
S02vadhdhdu:245_2: ca mama sarvasattvānāṃ ca kośakoṣṭhāgārāṇi ca sarvopakaraṇāni bharaṇi 2 svāhā /
S02vadhdhdu:263: oṃ śrīgurviṇīsukhena prasūtani mahātejaḥ śrī svāhā /
S02vadhdhdu:291: oṃ śrīvasudhāre dharaṇī dhāraṇī vasudhāraṇīye svāhā /
S02vadhdhdu:296: oṃ śrīśriye śrīkari dhanakari dhānyakari brī svāhā /
S02vadhdhdu:299: oṃ śrīdhanadhānyasamaye śrīkari vasundhari vasudhe svāhā /
S02vadhdhdu:301: oṃ śrīvasudhāre ehy ehi bhagavti samayam anusmara siddhiṃ kuru me hūṃ svāhā /
S02vadhdhdu:302_1: sarvopakaraṇaiḥ samṛddhiṃ me dehi sarvasattvānāṃ ca dehi me śāntiṃ puṣṭiṃ vaśaṃ siddhiṃ ca dadāpaya svāhā /
S02vadhdhdu:303: oṃ śrīdhanadhānyāya vinmahe sarvaratnālaṅkārasarvopakaraṇāni dhīmahi tanno śrīvasudhāraṇī pracodayāt svāhā /
S02vadhdhdu:309_0: oṃ yānapātra vahe dūragāmini anutpannānāṃ dravyāṇām utpādani utpannānāṃ ca dravyāṇāṃ
S02vadhdhdu:309_1: vṛddhiṃkari ṭili 2 ṭeli 2 iṭa 2 āgaccha āgaccha bhagavati mā vilamba mama sarvasattvānāṃ
S02vadhdhdu:309_2: ca manorathaṃ paripūraya daśabhyo digbhyaḥ yathodakadhārāḥ paripūrayanti mahīṃ yathā
S02vadhdhdu:309_3: bhāskaro raśminā vidhamayanti tamāṃ cittāntarāṇi tamastimiraṃ yathā sa śītāṃśunāpy āyati sarvoṣadhīḥ /
S02vadhdhdu:311: dhanado varuṇaś caiva indro vaivasvatas tathā tathā mahatī manonugāminī siddhiṃ cintayantu satataṃ sadyaḥ sarvā prayaccha yathākāmaṃ siddhyantāṃ mantrapadānīha /
S02vadhdhdu:312: tadyathā ḥ oṃ kheṭe 2 khiṭi 2 khuṭu 2 chucu 2 muru 2 muruṇḍa [Vdh-DH_140] 2 tarpari dehi dadāpaya svāhā /
S02vadhdhdu:350: oṃ sarvadhanadhānyasuvarṇanidhānāni māṃ dehi dadāpaya svāhā /
S02vadhdhdu:370: eteṣāṃ mama sarvasattvānāṃ ca sarvadhanadhānyasuvarṇanidhānāni dehi māṃ dadāpaya svāhā /
S02vadhdhdu:371: oṃ jambhalajalendrāya sarvadravyāṇi dehi māṃ dadāpaya svāhā /
S02vadhdhdu:375: oṃ jambhalajalendrāya jluṃ pluṃ saḥ svāhā /
S02vadhdhdu:397: oṃ śriye śrīkari dhanakari dhānyakari brīṃ svāhā /
S02vadhdhdu:413: oṃ śrī jluṃ pluṃ saḥ svāhā /
S02vadhdhdu:414: oṃ śrīguhyasakaṭike sarve ākarṣaya 2 oṃ śrī āharite mahābale hūṃ svāhā /
S02vadhdhdu:434: oṃ vajrasamāja jaḥ hūṃ baṃ hoḥ /
S02vadhdhdu:444: eteṣāṃ mama sarvasattvānāṃ ca dhanadhānyasuvarṇanidhānāni māṃ dehi dadāpaya svāhā /
S02vadhdhdu:445: oṃ jambhalajalendrāya sarvadravyaṃ dehi māṃ dadāpaya svāhā /
S02vadhdhdu:451: utpādayantu me kāṃkṣim aviraham anumodayantu ime mantrapadāḥ siddhyantu /
S02vadhdhdu:457: eṣa hṛdayo bhagavatyā mahāpāpakarmakāriṇo 'pi mantrapadāni siddhyanti /
S02vadhdhdu:458: kiṃ punaḥ śraddhyādhimuktikasya puruṣasya puruṣapramāṇaṃ mahābhogaṃ dadāti /
S02vadhdhdu:460: oṃ vajre 2 mahāvajre vajropame ṭake ṭhake hūṃ phaṭ svāhā /
S02vadhdhdu:461: oṃ śriye śrīkari dhanakari dhānyakari ehi āgacchāgaccha brīṃ svāhā /
S02vadhdhdu:464: oṃ aṣṭau yakṣiṇī [Vdh-DH_143] sarvapūjā hūṃ svāhā /
S02vadhdhdu:465: oṃ yān yān sarvakāmaṃ iha kāmayati /
S02vadhdhdu:469_0: oṃ namo devi dhanaduhite vasudhārāṃ pātaya 2 dhaneśvari ratnadehe huru 2 dhaneśvari
S02vadhdhdu:469_1: ratnaṃ me dehi dadāpaya ratnasāgaramahānidhāne nidhānakoṭiśatasahasraparivāre ehy
S02vadhdhdu:469_2: ehi bhagavati vasudhāre praviśya mama puraṃ mama bhavanaṃ mahānidhānaṃ pātaya 2 turu
S02vadhdhdu:471: asyā dhāraṇyāḥ prabhāveṇa rogadurbhikṣamarakādayo na prabhavanti /
S02vadhdhdu:472: yas tu kulaputra imāni vasudhārānāma dhāraṇīmantrapadāni tathāgatānām arhatānāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā ṣaṇmāsān āvartayet /
S02vadhdhdu:474: yasyāṃ diśi iyaṃ vidyā dhāryate sā dik pūjyamānā bhavati /
S02vadhdhdu:475_0: yasmin sthāne pūjyate pauṣṭikārthaṃ svagṛhe vā paragṛhe vā śraddhayā paramaśraddhayā
S02vadhdhdu:475_1: vasudhārā pratimāṃ bhaṭṭārikāṃ vā paṭaṃ vā agrato 'nuprasārya candanena caturasraṃ
S02vadhdhdu:475_3: balinaivedyavividhopacārair yathāvibhavaṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā dharmabhāṇakaś cāpi sugandhajalasnātaḥ
S02vadhdhdu:475_4: sugandhāṅgaśucivastraṃ prāvṛtyamayūrāsenopari samupaviśya pratimāpaṭṭādikaṃ vā sthāpayitvā
S02vadhdhdu:475_5: tam evānusmṛtya sūryodayavelāyāṃ paripūjayitvā pratyaham akhaṇḍasamādānato yāvad
S02vadhdhdu:475_6: eva sakalāṃ rātriṃ dhāraṇīm avicchinnam āvartayet /
S02vadhdhdu:477_0: tataḥ prāktena pi divase niyamena [Vdh-DH_144] rātrim atināmayitvā punaḥ pratyuṣe
S02vadhdhdu:477_1: sugandhajalasnātaḥ śuciramalavastrāvṛto brahmacārī bhūtvā śubhe sthāne sanidānadhāraṇīm
S02vadhdhdu:478: tataḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā mahāpuruṣamātrayā vasudhārayā gṛhaṃ paripūrayanti /
S02vadhdhdu:479: sarvadhanadhānyahiraṇyasuvarṇaś ca sarvopakaraṇaiś ca sarvopadravāś ca nāśayati /
S02vadhdhdu:480_0: yad vā tathaiva pratyuṣe sugandhajalasnātaḥ śuciramalavastrāvṛto madyapānarahito
S02vadhdhdu:480_1: nirāmiṣālavaṇabhojī brahmacārī pauṣṭikārthaṃ svagṛhe vā paragṛhe vā śubhe sthāne
S02vadhdhdu:480_2: kośakoṣṭhāgāre vā candanena caturasraṃ maṇḍalakaṃ kṛtvā bhagavataḥ śrīmadāryāvalokiteśvarasya
S02vadhdhdu:480_4: cāgrato yathāvibhavam udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā susamāhitaḥ tām eva bhagavatiṃ bhāvayenn
S02vadhdhdu:480_5: ekacittotpādena dānapatihitasukhāśayaḥ śraddhyā paramaśraddhyā sanidānām imāṃ dhāraṇīm
S02vadhdhdu:480_6: ekamahorātraṃ saptāhorātrāṇi vā parikṣānālayann āvicchinnam āvartayet /
S02vadhdhdu:481: ācāryas tathaiva niyamena rātres triṣkṛtvā divasasyāpi triṣkṛtvā sarvabalyupahāraiḥ pūjayet /
S02vadhdhdu:482: tathaiva dānapatir api niyamena sarvam ācaret /
S02vadhdhdu:485: tataḥ kṣaṇamātrayā gṛhapate vasudhārayā mahāpuruṣamātrayā vasudhārā dānapateḥ gṛhaṃ paripūrayati /
S02vadhdhdu:486: sarvadhanadhānyahiraṇyasuvarṇaḥ sarvopakaraṇaiś ca sarvopadravāś ca nāśayati /
S02vadhdhdu:487: tena hi tvaṃ gṛhapate sarvaprayatnīkṛtyodgṛhṇīṣvemāṃ vasudhārānāmadhāraṇīṃ dhāraya vācaya deśaya grāhaya paryavāpnuhi parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati sma /
S02vadhdhdu:488: tato bhaviṣyati dīrgharātram arthāya hitāya sukhāya bhogāya [Vdh-DH_145] yogasambhārāya kṣemāya subhikṣāya ceti /
S02vadhdhdu:490: bhagavato vacanaṃ pratiśrutya bhagavataḥ sucandro nāma gṛhapatiḥ bhagavato 'ntikād imāṃ vasudhārānāmadhāraṇīṃ śrutā /
S02vadhdhdu:491: śrutvā hṛṣṭatuṣṭa udagra āttamanā pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhagavataś caraṇayor nipatya kṛtakarapuṭo bhūtvā bhagavantam etad avocat /
S02vadhdhdu:492: udgṛhītā me bhagavann iyaṃ vasudhārānāma dhāraṇī prahvīkṛtā dhāritā vācitā paryavāptānumoditā manasā suparicintitā parebhyaś ca vistareṇa idānīm ahaṃ saṃprakāśayiṣyāmīti /
S02vadhdhdu:493: atha tatkṣaṇamātreṇa sa sucandro nāma gṛhapatiḥ paripūrṇakośakoṣṭāgāro 'bhūt /
S02vadhdhdu:494_0: atha khalu sucandro gṛhapatir bhagavantam anekaśatasahasraṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavataḥ
S02vadhdhdu:494_1: pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ punaḥ punar avalokya bhagavato 'ntikāt svagṛhaṃ prakrāntaḥ /
S02vadhdhdu:495_0: prakramya ca sa gṛhapatir ābhyantaraṃ praviśyādrākṣīt paripūrṇasarvadhanadhānyaratnajātasamṛddhaṃ
S02vadhdhdu:495_1: sarvopakaraṇaiś ca kośakoṣṭhāgārāṇi ca paripūrṇāni dṛṣṭā ca vismito hṛṣṭatuṣṭa udagra
S02vadhdhdu:495_3: buddhe bhagavati vasudhārānāmadhāraṇīṃ ca tīvrapremagurugauravaṃ prāsādikabahumāne
S02vadhdhdu:496: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandaṃ āmantrayate sma /
S02vadhdhdu:497: gaccha tvaṃ ānanda sucandrasya gṛhapater agāraṃ paśya paripūrṇasarvadhanadhānyasamṛddhaṃ sarvaratnasuvarṇaiḥ sarvopakaraṇaiś ca mahākośakoṣṭhāgārāṇi ca paripūrṇāni /
S02vadhdhdu:498_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānando bhagavato vacanaṃ pratiśrutya yena kośāmbīmahānagarī yena
S02vadhdhdu:498_1: sucandraniveśas taṃ gatvā tasyāgāraṃ tenopasaṃkrānta upasaṃkramyābhyantaraṃ praviśyādrākṣīt
S02vadhdhdu:498_2: paripūrṇasarvadhanadhānyasamṛddhaṃ mahākośakoṣṭhāgārāṇi ca paripūrṇāni dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭatuṣṭa
S02vadhdhdu:498_3: udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrānta upasaṃkramyāyuṣmān
S02vadhdhdu:498_4: ānando vismitaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantam etad avocat /
S02vadhdhdu:499: ko [Vdh-DH_146] bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yena sucandro nāma gṛhapatir mahādhano mahābhogo mahākośakoṣṭhāgāradhanadhānyahiraṇyasuvarṇaratnajātasamṛddho jātaḥ /
S02vadhdhdu:500_0: bhagavān āha śrāddhānanda sucandro nāma gṛhapatiḥ paramaśrāddhaḥ kalyāṇāśayo dhāritā
S02vadhdhdu:500_1: vācitā ca teneyaṃ vasudhārānāmadhāraṇī pravartitā udgṛhītā dhāritā vācitā paryavāptā
S02vadhdhdu:501_0: tenoktā ānanda tvam apy udgṛhīṣvemāṃ vasudhārānāmadhāraṇīṃ dhāraya vācaya deśaya
S02vadhdhdu:501_1: grāhaya paryavāpnuhi parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśaya bhaviṣyanti tadbahujanahitāya
S02vadhdhdu:501_2: bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyair mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca
S02vadhdhdu:501_3: manuṣyāṇāṃ ca yasya gṛhapater ānandeyaṃ dhāraṇī hastagatā pustakagatā bhaviṣyati /
S02vadhdhdu:502: hṛdayagatā dhāritā vācitā cintitā śrutimātragatā gṛhagatā pustakagatā pūjitā ca bhaviṣyati /
S02vadhdhdu:505: bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyair mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca nāham ānanda taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi /
S02vadhdhdu:506: sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ sadevāsuramānuṣyāṇāṃ ya imāṃ vidyāṃ anyathā kariṣyati atikramiṣyati vācā naitat sthānaṃ vidyate /
S02vadhdhdu:507: tat kasya hetor abhedyāni hy etāny ānanda vasudhārānāmadhāraṇīmantrapadāni na cetāni kṣīṇakuśalamūlānāṃ śrutipatham āgamiṣyati /
S02vadhdhdu:508: kaḥ punar vādo ye pustakagatāni hṛdayagatāni dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti /
S02vadhdhdu:509_0: tat kasya hetoḥ sarvatathāgatair iyaṃ bhāṣitā dhāraṇī adhiṣṭhitā svamudrayā mudritā
S02vadhdhdu:509_1: prakāśitā anumoditā prabhāvitā praśastā saṃvarṇitā vivṛtā uttānīkṛtā ārocitā ākhyātā
S02vadhdhdu:509_3: hitāya sukhāya saṃbhogāya paribhogāya kṣemāya ceti /
S02vadhdhdu:510: ānanda āha ḥ udgṛhītā me bhagavann iyaṃ vasudhārānāmadhāraṇī dhāritā vācitā paryavāptā anumoditā manasā suparicintitā ca sādhu bhagavann iti /
S02vadhdhdu:511_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānanda utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇajānumaṇḍalaṃ
S02vadhdhdu:511_1: pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya kṛtakarapuṭo bhūtvā bhagavataḥ
S02vadhdhdu:511_2: mukham avalokya yadīdānīṃ tasyāṃ velāyām imāṃ gāthā abhāṣat /
S02vadhdhdu:513: āpūrṇam asmin gṛheṣu maṇḍalaṃ namo 'stu te śrīvasudhāraṇī sadā //
S02vadhdhdu:519: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānando imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ bhagavato 'ntikāt śrutvā hṛṣṭatuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditā prītisaumanasyajāto bhagavantam etad avocat /
S02vadhdhdu:520: ko nāmāyaṃ bhagavanta dharmaparyāyaḥ kathaṃ bhagavan dhārayāmy enaṃ dharmaparyāyam /
S02vadhdhdu:521_0: bhagavān āha ḥ sucandragṛhapatiparipṛcchety api ānanda dhāraya sarvadhanadhānyahiraṇyasuvarṇaratnanidhānam
S02vadhdhdu:521_1: ity api dhāraya sarvatathāgatapraśastety api dhāraya sarvatathāgatādhiṣṭhitā vasudhārādhāraṇīkalpam ity api dhāraya /
S02vadhdhdu:522_0: idam avocad bhagavān āttamanā āyuṣmān ānandas te ca bhikṣavas te ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ
S02vadhdhdu:522_1: sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragaruḍagandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandann iti /
S02vadhdhdu:524: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hy avadat /
S02vadhdhdu:525: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
